add_member_to_space.description: Add an existing member to a specific space by their email.

props.name: email
props.description: The email address of the member to add to the space.

create_comment.description: Creates a new comment on a post.

props.name: parent_comment_id
props.description: ID of the comment to reply to. Leave empty if not a reply.

props.name: skip_notifications
props.description: Skip sending notifications for this comment?

create_post.description: Creates a new post in a specific space.

props.name: text_body
props.description: Simple plain text content for the post. Used if 'Tiptap Body JSON' is not provided.

props.name: tiptap_body_json
props.description: Full TipTap JSON object for the post body. If provided, 'Post Body (Plain Text)' is ignored.

props.name: published_at
props.description: If status is 'scheduled', provide the future date and time for publishing.

props.name: skip_notifications
props.description: Prevent notifications from being sent for this post?

props.name: user_email
props.description: Email of an existing community member to create this post as. If empty, posts as the authenticated admin.

find_member_by_email.description: Finds a community member by their email address.

props.name: email
props.description: The email address of the member to find.

get_member_details.description: Fetches the full profile details for a specific community member.

get_post_details.description: Retrieves the complete details of a specific post.

new_member_added.description: Triggers when a new member is added to the community.

new_post_created.description: Triggers when a new post is created in a specific space.
